stimulusHtml: Which of the following processes is most likely occurring?

features.html: Some psychoactive drugs increase neurotransmitter availability along the reward center pathway by trapping neurotransmitters in the synapse, the gap between neurons. This process creates a sense of well-being.

choicesHtml: The drug acts as a reuptake inhibitor.
The drug acts as an antagonist.
The drug no longer works effectively because the body has developed a tolerance to it.
The drug only works because of the placebo effect.
